ValidationRule.description: GL Users cannot leave fields blank if Category field equals Remapping COA or Missing Account
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS( $Profile.Name ,'System Admin')), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Solved"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Category_1__c , "Remapping COA") ,ISPICKVAL(Category_1__c , "Missing Accounts")),OR(ISPICKVAL(Mapping_Time__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Complexity__c, ""), ISBLANK(Timing_Notes__c) ,ISPICKVAL(Exporting_Reporting_Utilized__c, "") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must fill in the timing notes when Category 1 equals "Remapping COA" or "Missing Account".
